incoming_variable_name.description: The name of the incoming variable name

input_filepath.description: The input filepath that will be read

output_variable_name.description: The output variable name where the data will be stored

output_filepath.description: The name of the value where the data will be stored

sql_filepath.description: The path to the sql statement

sql_statement.description: The sql statement that will be used

table_identifier.description: The table identifier of the table. PUBLIC.TABLE_NAME

sql_statement_from.description: The input that will be used
